full_sentence: Seeing my dumb ass brothers learning to swim in the ocean gives me so much! what's the word? ! oh yes!... Joy!

topics.sentence_slice: dumb ass brothers learning to swim

full_sentence: My fucking wish is to have enough money to make investments that matter. I'm not even a fag and neither is anyone in my family, but any investing you can do with normal middle-class income homophobic companies in western Europe is complete chump-change. You basically do it to beat inflation and that's it.
